Milletimiz insanlarının çoğunun oynamadan ''beğenmediği'' oyuna gelelim .  Bana göre CS serisinin en iyi oyunudur . Troller yok , veletler yok oyunda , sinir eden insanlar yok . Oyunu eğlenmek için oynuyosun bi kere . Gılobıl ofınsayf gibi adam seni öldürünce çıldırmıyosun çünkü eğlenmek , stres atmak için giriyosun , rank düşmeyeceğini biliyosun . 11/10 CS serisinin (bana göre) son ve en güzel oyunudur . Tek kötü(!) yanı Türk oyucuların çok olmaması , ki bu da sorun yaratmaz bence , sinir eden Türkler de yok (GO'daki gibi)
Моя прелесть.

This is my first "review". I'm just going to talk about my experience with this game, and my situation to this day. I should have done a review for Counter-Strike a long time ago, especially since I have been playing since the Half-Life days. (Before Ricochet, TF classic, and Day of Defeat) I just hit a little more than 1k hours on this account. With three accounts, I got a total of almost 4k hours. Went through 1.3, 1.4, 1.5, 1.6, Source, and GO. CSGO is fun, but Counter-Strike Source is still the best one for me. Everything about this game is on point. Of course, GO has better graphics, and gameplay.. blah blah blah. I respect your point of view, but this is my opinion, so you do you young homie, imma do me. The best part about this is the regulars. I met a lot of people over the years in the same servers, and felt like we were our own community. Respectful people, and skillful players. If you plan on buying Source, or already own it, come play in the DOGZ Funtimes/Iceworld Gungame Server or the [HG] Dust2 Unlimited Deathmatch Server and say whats up!

Counter-Strike: Source is a game that most source games piggy back off. It is a good game but it is a old game and isn't played much anymore unless someone is going there to bunny hop. There are lots of world records on Counter-Strike: Source. If you have low frames per seconds this is the game for you. If you want the materials for Garry's Mod legally then I would get this game because ninety percent of the materials for Garry's Mod come from Counter-Strike: Source.
